page.description: Get the sharing mode of the file the table.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.FILE_MODE_GET() Syntax Mode as N = &ltTBL>.FILE_MODE_GET() Description The &ltTBL>.FILE_MODE_GET()returns the Mode in which the table referenced by &ltTBL> was opened. Possible values for Mode are:
16 (Read only, exclusive)
18 (Read/write, exclusive)
64 (Read only, shared)
66 (Read/write, shared) Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("Functions", FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) ? tbl.file_mode_get() = 18.000000
See Also Table Functions and Methods
